title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of taking the FIITJEE admission test for the second time? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have selected the right guy…… I also join Fiitjée in 2nd attempt truth..this a also come to my mind during filling 2nd application form.. In my first attempt i was in 10th as I am belongs to lower middle class family I filled the application form of fortunate 40 (Fiitjée scheme for financially weak students) and I was offered 100 percent Scholorship in Fiitjée south Delhi centre but unfortunately not joined it because of some valid reasons .. So as like you I was thinking during filling application form in 13th (dropper) about the benefits of previous test …… But in this time I was offered 65 percent Scholorship this time …stop …before concluding something …the highest percent of Scholorship was 75 . Now you can conclude. In my opinion(advantage and disadvantage) there is no relation between your previous results with new one . Thank you ,
